item.description: It's game night at 6 East Street with the ladies of lore! They have suggested gaming it up, playing all manner of fun things. Ready to learn and able to cast thy meeples down, we want to game like there is no more sheep to be collected nor tile to be layed! Games that we have include, but certainly not limited to, Ave Caesar, Nefarious, King of Tokyo, Diamant√©, Agricola, Ticket to Ride Europe, Trans America, Lords of Vegas, and many more. Come by and feel free to bring some games, drink some booze, and cast dice till the morning light.
item.how_to_find_us: By red shoe bar off of either Ham Street or New York Street. Yellow house, second story.
item.name: Gaming with the ladies
